attributes.action: strenghten the United Kingdom's biological controls on food and plant imports due to the spread of exotic spiders and other insects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change the UK's laissez faire attitude  o biological control which has led to the spread of the venimous false widow spider and which could to the spread of the Black Widow in imports of food and plants. This causes a risk both to humans and native animal species.
